extension_description.message: Enables a special password-protected bookmark folder.

privacy_context_option.message: Disable Private Bookmarks outside of private browsing

whats_new_notification_option.message: Let me know what's new after an update

export_plain_data_requirements.message: Exporting plain data requires unlocked bookmarks.

export_encrypted_data_command.description: Appears as a button that downloads encrypted private bookmark data.

import_folder_title.description: The title of a folder to host imported bookmarks.

import_error_invalid_file.message: The selected file could not be parsed.

import_error_encrypted_import_failed.message: The import operation failed. Are you sure you entered the correct password for this file?

feedback_label.message: Something's not working? Got a question and/or suggestion?

post_feedback_command.description: 'issue' refers to a GitHub issue. Appears directly after feedback_label.

password_requirements.message: Must be $MIN$â€“$MAX$ characters long, containing at least one letter and one number.

confirm_cancel_positive.description: A positive response to a confirm/cancel question.

confirm_cancel_negative.description: A negative response to a confirm/cancel question.

yes_no_positive.description: A positive response to a yes/no question.

yes_no_negative.description: A negative response to a yes/no question.

error_message_beginning.message: Oops! There was an error. You can help by
error_message_beginning.description: Forms one sentence together with error_message_ending

error_message_ending.description: Forms one sentence together with error_message_beginning.

error_message_addendum.message: Private Bookmarks is still in early development. Sorry for the inconvenience.

unlocked_successfully.message: Your bookmarks have been unlocked! Check the '$TITLE$' folder under '$PARENT_TITLE$'.

password_changed_successfully.message: Your password has been changed successfully.

confirm_data_clearance_question.message: This will delete all private bookmarks permanently, and a new password will need to be set up. Are you sure you wish to continue?

added_bookmark_successfully.message: The page has been added to your private bookmarks.
